column1: '''Dr. Stephen Yandell''' is Assistant Professor of English at [[wikipedia:Xavier University (Cincinnati)|Xavier University]] in Cincinnati
column2: Ohio. He has written several articles on the [[Inklings]] [[C.S. Lewis]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column3: and gives an undergraduate class of Tolkien.

column1: * [[1995]]: ''[[Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]'':
** "'A Pattern Which Our Nature Cries Out For': The Medieval Tradition of the Ordered Four in the Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien"
* [[2006]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment]]''

column4: and the New Middle Ages" ([[wikipedia:Wilmington College (Ohio)|Wilmington College]])
